processKey.label: Key

resources.helpText: Add any additional external resources that help members understand the {{type}}.

METADATA.description: The information you provide on this page will be displayed alongside proposals of this type. It is purely informational, used to help voters understand the governance process and make a more informed decision.

STAGES.description: Design the process for deciding whether or not a proposal of this type passes and its actions executed. The proposals can go through any number of sequential stages. Within each stage, governing bodies can either approve or veto the proposal.
STAGES.name: Governance design
STAGES.title: Design the governance process

error.alreadyMember: Address is already a member of the DAO

endTime.helpText: Define when a proposal should expire. After the expiration time, there is no way to approve or execute the proposal.
endTime.infoText: Itâs recommended to have an expiration time of {{days}} days, so you have a clean proposal list.
endTime.label: Expiration time

startTime.helpText: Define when a proposal should be active to receive approvals. If now is selected, the proposal is immediately active after publishing.
startTime.label: Start time

alert.majority: Proposal will be approved by majority
alert.minority: Proposals could be approved by a minority rather than a majority.

minimumApproval.helpText: Minimum approval is the amount of addresses in the authorized list that must approve a proposal for it to pass.
minimumApproval.label: Minimum approval

onlyListed.helpText: Specify who is permitted to create proposals and what the minimum requirement is.
onlyListed.label: Proposal creation

advanceStageDialog.description: To advance the proposal to the next stage you have to confirm the onchain transaction with your wallet.
advanceStageDialog.title: Advance proposal

startTime.helpText: Define when the first stage should start. If now is selected, the first stage is immediately active after publishing.
startTime.label: Start time

pending.description: Starts when previous stage is advanced
pending.heading: Timelock pending

endTime.helpText: Define how long the voting should last in days, or add an exact date and time for it to conclude.
endTime.infoText: The minimum duration of {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes is defined by DAO governance settings
endTime.label: End time

startTime.helpText: Define when a proposal should be active to receive approvals. If now is selected, the proposal is immediately active after publishing.
startTime.label: Start time

tokenGovernanceSettings.proposalAccess: Members with â¥ {{balance}} {{symbol}} voting power or balance

options.label: Do you want to {{label}} this proposal?

earlyExecution.helpText: Allows a proposal to be executed before the voting period ends if the support threshold is surpassed, the minimum participation is met, and the outcome cannot be changed by more voters participating.
earlyExecution.label: Early execution

eligibleField.helpText: Specify who is permitted to create proposals and what the minimum requirement is.
eligibleField.label: Who is eligible

members.description: Only members with at least this much voting power or token balance can create proposals.
members.label: Members

alert.description: Set this to a duration that is long enough for your members to have sufficient time to vote. Itâs recommended to set this to at least 1 day.

minDuration.helpText: The shortest period of time a proposal is open for voting. Proposals can be created with a longer duration, but not shorter.
minDuration.label: Minimum duration

minParticipation.helpText: The percentage of tokens that participate in a proposal, out of the total test supply, must be greater than or equal to this value for the proposal to pass.
minParticipation.label: Minimum participation

minVotingPower.helpText: Only members with at least this much voting power or token balance can create proposals.
minVotingPower.label: Minimum requirement

alert.majority: Proposal will be approved by majority
alert.minority: Proposals could be approved by a minority rather than a majority.

supportThreshold.helpText: The percentage of tokens that vote Yes in support of a proposal, out of all tokens that have voted, must be greater than this value for the proposal to pass.
supportThreshold.label: Support threshold

voteChange.helpText: Allows voters to change their vote during the voting period. This setting canât be enabled if early execution is enabled.
voteChange.label: Vote change

ADMIN_PLUGIN.message: This DAO is under construction. One or more admins can make any change to the DAO without a proposal.

confirmWizardExit.message: If you leave this process, you'll lose all the information you've entered so far.

errorFeedback.description: If you'd like to help, please report the issue to our team.
errorFeedback.title: Something went wrong

invalid.description: Some values are not valid. Review and fix the invalid data to proceed.
invalid.title: Invalid data

invalid-required.description: Some inputs are not filled or are invalid. Review, fix, and fill out all mandatory data to proceed.
invalid-required.title: Missing and invalid data

required.description: Some inputs are not filled. Review and fill out all mandatory data to proceed.
required.title: Missing data
